data.title: Elfriede Jelinek – Litmus Press
data.meta_description: Works by Elfriede Jelinek include The Piano Teacher, Women as Lovers, Lust, and Wonderful, Wonderful Times, all translated by P.J. Blumenthal and published by Serpent’s Tail Press
data.text:
Litmus Press @ Asterism Books!

We’re very pleased to announce our new partnership with Asterism Books. All our titles, including in-print titles from O Books and the Post-Apollo Press are now available through Asterism.

We are very grateful for your support during this transition — from donations, to direct orders, to new memberships — and look forward to getting back to making books!

Queries about specific titles may still be sent to [email protected] and we will continue to offer Pre-sales for new titles and Memberships through our Shop.
